mapper.select: select uid from hytb_patient_imlog where doctorid=#{doctorid} and patientid=#{patientid}
mapper.update: update hytb_patient_imlog set settime=#{nowDate} where uid=#{loguid}
mapper.select: SELECT imlog.patientidnamepinyin as firstLetter,patient.name,patient.uid as patientuid,patient.headimageurl FROM hytb_patient_imlog imlog left join t_users patient on imlog.patientid=patient.uid order by settime,patientidnamepinyin DESC
